content: is there such a thing as  \"breakfast around the world\" recipe book?

Yes, there are several recipe books available that focus on breakfast dishes from different countries around the world. Some popular examples include "Breakfast for Dinner: Recipes for Frittata Florentine, Huevos Rancheros, Sunny-Side-Up Burgers, and More!" by Lindsay Landis and Taylor Hackbarth, "World Breakfasts: Collection of Recipes from Across the Globe" by Various Authors, and "Breakfast Around the World: Over 30 Delicious Recipes from Across the Globe" by Sara Lewis.
